oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nitrogen and phosphorus leakage in ecological recycling agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schneider, Thomas
Kuisma, Miia
Seuri, Pentti
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this report we quantify nitrogen and phosphorus leakage on three farms in the BERAS project. The study is based on direct measurements of nitrogen and phosphorus concentration in drainage water and water flow measurements.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schneider, Thomas; Kuisma, Miia and Seuri, Pentti (2005) Nitrogen and phosphorus leakage in ecological recycling agriculture. In: Granstedt, Artur; Thomsson, Olof and Schneider, Thomas (Eds.) Environmental impacts of eco-local food systems - final report from BERAS work package 2. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 46. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, chapter IV, pp. 60-70.
